name: Keep Bloo Alive
description:
This game was made for Ludum Dare 46 in 72 hours by James Fitzgerald and David Fitzgerald. The goal is to keep your baby dragon alive by feeding and protecting him.  Defeat all the manbearpigs to get to the MANBEARPIG KING boss so there are no threats left to Bloo.

Control:

Shoot = Left Mouse Button
Movement = WASD
